title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 11 - Insider Transactions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 11 - Insider Transactions

State Regulations
§ 11.1 - Definitions
§ 11.2 - Violations; unauthorized and unsafe banking practices
§ 11.3 - Approval and disclosure of insider transactions
§ 11.4 - Aggregation of insider transactions
§ 11.5 - Information pertaining to insider transactions; files
§ 11.6 - Discovery of insider relationship
§ 11.7 - Knowledge of proposed insider transaction
§ 11.8 - Action by executive or other committee of bank
§ 11.9 - Compliance with other laws and regulations

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 11

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
